name: Bella Thorne
description:
Version 2 For these images i used VisionGenRealism old one Version using nearest for the Upscaler and lowered the weight a little to 0.8 30 steps using Euler A with 60 in upscale

Version 1

Based on Bella Thorne i found using weight 0.70 and 0.80 to be good made with realistic vision but prompts well in vision gen and others I've tried as well

Currently in beta as still testing check out my Patreon if you want to download and try for yourself 

Based on Bella Thorne an Actress Singer and Onlyfans Hottie works very well with models I've used realistic vision and Visiongen (older version) also for a more art style look allymixIII

recommend using euler a with around 50 steps DDIM with 30 and dpm 2m karras with 70 steps all produce good results. CFG scale 10.5 denoise 0.43

Easy to prompt just use photo realistic and skin details at the end of your prompts

About me

Check out my profile on DeviantArt for my latest works

RDigitalArtist - Hobbyist, Digital Artist | DeviantArt

And my Patreon for model downloads and more

RDigitalArtist | Creating Digital Art of hot babes and Models for SD | Patreon

Download my Public Models Here 
RegularDamo Creator Profile | Civitai

modelVersions.name: V2.0
modelVersions.description:
Made changes to how i make LORA models this is the newer Version, will do Version 1 images very easily and more trick for seeing Bella is to use photo realistic CKPTS and choosing her hair style and colour. For these images i went with a 0.8 weight as it fittted what i was creating at the time, If you want bella Thorne i would use 1.0

Trained using over 50 Images
